fields.name: Human
fields.description: Flexible and adaptable with no inherent strengths or weaknesses.

fields.name: Vampire
fields.description: Immortal, powerful, and cursed by the sun and Hamon energy.

fields.name: Pillar Man
fields.description: An ancient being with evolving powers and extreme vulnerabilities.

fields.name: Gambling
fields.description: You throw yourself into games of chance and reckless bets.

fields.name: Obsession
fields.description: You relentlessly pursue a goal, no matter the cost.

fields.name: Violence
fields.description: You only feel release through bloodshed and conflict.

fields.name: Shadow
fields.description: Expend Stand Armor to resist detection or perform stealth feats.

fields.name: Iron Will
fields.description: You are immune to the terror that Bizarre entities inflict on sight. +1d when resisting with Resolve.

fields.name: Functioning Vice
fields.description: Adjust dice outcome when indulging your vice. An ally may do the same.
